bayes_network.cpd

Class CPDTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayes_network.cpd.CPDTree

  • public class CPDTree
extends java.lang.Object
    A tree data structure used for representing and storing the conditional probability distribution (CPD) for a specific node in a Bayesian network.
    Author:
    Matthew Bernstein - matthewb@cs.wisc.edu

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  CPDTree.ToStringHelper
      A private helper class used for traversing the tree recursively in order to convert the tree to a String
